title: Chapter 1: The Robotic Nervous System (ROS 2) - Introduction and Core Concepts
description: Welcome to Module 1! In this module, we'll dive into the heart of modern robotics: the Robot Operating System 2 (ROS 2). Think of ROS 2 as the nervous system of a robot, allowing different parts (like its brain, sensors, and motors) to communicate and work together.
